title: ‘I was naive in being hopeful’: Labour voters feel let down after first year
description: Party’s supporters tell of dissatisfaction, but many feel the Starmer government’s good points have been overlooked
content:
Labour supporters have told the Guardian of their dissatisfaction with the party’s first year in government, as Keir Starmer marks 12 months since becoming the first Labour prime minister since Gordon Brown.

title: Dalai Lama celebrates his 90th birthday, triggering geopolitical questions for the future
description: Tibetans fear China will eventually name a rival successor to the Dalai Lama, bolstering Beijing’s control over Tibet
content:
Leaders from India, the United States and Taiwan offered their support to Tibet’s exiled spiritual leader, the Dalai Lama, on his 90th birthday on Sunday, a landmark anniversary raising geopolitical questions for the future.
